Name: Wizard War VR
About the game: Wizard War VR is a MOBA magic shooting game! Destroy enemy's flag behind the wall using variety of magics! Cooperate with your teammates to defeat enemy! Magics can be cast by swinging your hand to forward, backward, left, right, up and down. Each gesture provides skills of different elements. There is shop system for both mods. You must get credits from your actions. With credit, it's available to upgrade, buy weapons, get professions, and enhanced yourself. We support two game mods, which are MOBA and 1:1 Death Match. For MOBA mod, each team could have 3 members, and for 1:1 mod, you have 5 rounds to achieve victory!
